title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Best wishes to Rudy Giuliani for speedy recovery. Rush pays tribute to the hilarious and brilliant Dr. E. Walter Williams. Losers don't draw crowds like Trump did in Georgia. Thomas L. Friedman says Biden is hard to hate, basically admitting he hates Trump, hopes he never has to write another column about him. Rush was first to tell Trump to go to Georgia. Important for Trump to win the two Senate races to save the MAGA agenda. Trump will not descend into being a nobody. Trump's connection to his voters is unheard of in American politics, will not fade away. Sound bites from Trump's speech in Georgia. If you're threatened by MAGA and America First, you're not a traditional American. Crowd chants "We love you!" and "Stop the steal!" at Trump Georgia rally. Trump says he'd concede graciously if he actually lost, but it was stolen. GOP Lt. governor of Georgia insists election was fair. Establishment GOP has always existed to lose with honor, Trump threatens that. Are there really 80 million Americans who hate their country?

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Pollster Patrick Basham's analysis of Biden's implausible "victory", according to dozens of different metrics. Ware County Georgia test of Dominion tabulators showed algorithmic bias to Biden? Everyone is waiting for something big to happen. Does Trump have a master plan? Why conservatives don't take to the streets like the left does. Protesters surround home of Democrat Michigan Secretary of State. Governor Newsom partners with Google and Apple to make COVID exposure notifications available through your cell phone if you opt-in.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Mollie Hemingway on how the Georgia ballot video we discussed on Friday's show has not been debunked. Thousands of underage and ineligible voters voted in Georgia. Big Tech, Big Media burying the evidence of a fraudulent election. If there's so much fraud why aren't courts, elected officials in Georgia accepting it? If you're in Georgia, you have to register and vote. California restaurant owner video goes viral. VA Governor Ralph Northam says churches are a big problem in Virginia. This election was a total failure of the system to protect our rights. Judge orders audit of 22 Dominion machines in Michigan.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
